tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE robot_inventory (
    part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    part_name VARCHAR(255),
    part_description TEXT,
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE robot_components (
    component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_name VARCHAR(50),
    part_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (part_id) REFERENCES robot_parts(part_id)
);

CREATE TABLE robot_parts (
    part_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    part_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    part_category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE robot_components (
    component_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    component_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    component_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    component_description TEXT,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE lab_inventory (
    inventory_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    inventory_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    inventory_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    last_checked DATE
);

CREATE TABLE robot_parts (
    part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    part_name VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE component_parts (
    component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_name VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    part_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE lab_technicians (
    technician_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    technician_name VARCHAR(50),
    speciality VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE part_suppliers (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(50),
    contact_info VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE robot_assembly (
  robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  robot_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  assembly_date DATE,
  parts_used TEXT,
  components_used TEXT
);
